trans-unit.source: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 为创建和管理由 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 类使用的连接字符串的内容提供了一种简单方法。

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder lets developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: 通过连接字符串生成器，开发人员可以使用该类的属性和方法，以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串以及分析和重新生成现有的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串生成器提供了与 SQL Server 允许的已知键/值对相对应的强类型属性。

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 需要在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类生成和修改连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用该类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> performs checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 对键/值对的有效性进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use this class to create invalid connection strings; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不能使用该类创建无效的连接字符串；尝试添加无效对将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms and can translate from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name.
trans-unit.target: 该类保持一个固定的同义词集合，可以将同义词转换为相应的已知键名。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use the **Item** property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当使用**项**属性来检索值时，你可以指定包含所需的键任何同义词的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify "Network Address", "addr", or any other acceptable synonym for this key within a connection string when you use any member that requires a string that contains the key name, such as the **Item** property or the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定"Network Address"、"addr"或任何其他可接受的同义词，此连接字符串中的键时使用需要一个字符串，包含键名称，如任何成员**项**属性或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property for a full list of acceptable synonyms.
trans-unit.target: 有关可接受同义词的完整列表，请参见 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The **Item** property handles tries to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: **项**属性处理尝试插入恶意项。

trans-unit.target: 结果为以下连接字符串，该字符串以安全方式处理无效值：

trans-unit.source: The following console application builds connection strings for a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: 以下控制台应用程序生成的连接字符串[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]数据库。

trans-unit.source: The code uses a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class to create the connection string, and then passes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> instance to the constructor of the connection class.
trans-unit.target: 该代码使用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类创建连接字符串，然后将 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> 实例的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 属性传递到连接类的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The example also parses an existing connection string and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还分析了现有连接字符串，并演示了各种操作连接字符串的内容的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a password to demonstrate how <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> works with connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个密码以演示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 如何使用连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: 对象内部连接信息的基础。

trans-unit.source: Parsed into name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 分析为名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: Invalid key names raise <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" />.
trans-unit.target: 无效的键名会引发 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的连接字符串为实例的内部连接信息提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类提供键/值对的固定内部集合。

trans-unit.source: Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 即使您只提供构造函数中可能的连接字符串值的一个小子集，该对象也会始终提供每个键/值对的默认值。

trans-unit.source: When the `ConnectionString` property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is not the default value for the item.
trans-unit.target: 当`ConnectionString`检索的对象属性，该字符串包含仅在其中的值不是项的默认值的键/值对。

trans-unit.source: The following example supplies a simple SQL Server connection string in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> object's constructor, and then iterates through all the key/value pairs within the object.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例在 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 对象的构造函数中提供一个简单的 SQL Server 连接字符串，然后循环访问该对象中的所有键/值对。

trans-unit.source: Note that the collection provides default values for each item.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该集合提供每一项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class converts synonyms for the well-known keys so that they are consistent with the well-known names.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类会转换已知键的同义词，使其与已知名称一致。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a password to demonstrate how <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> works with connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个密码以演示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 如何使用连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: Invalid key name within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串中包含无效的键名。

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串中包含无效的值（具体而言，需要使用布尔值或数值，但字符串中并未提供）。

trans-unit.source: The supplied <paramref name="connectionString" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的 <paramref name="connectionString" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Declares the application workload type when connecting to a database in an SQL Server Availability Group.
trans-unit.target: 连接到 SQL Server 可用性组中的数据库时声明应用程序工作负荷类型。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property with <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.ApplicationIntent" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.ApplicationIntent" /> 设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about SqlClient support for Always On Availability Groups, see [SqlClient Support for High Availability, Disaster Recovery](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关对 Always On 可用性组的 SqlClient 支持的详细信息，请参阅[对高可用性、灾难恢复的 SqlClient 支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the property (a value of type <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.ApplicationIntent" />).
trans-unit.target: 返回该属性的当前值（类型 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.ApplicationIntent" /> 的值）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application associated with the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与连接字符串关联的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application, or ".NET SqlClient Data Provider" if no name has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的名称；或者，如果未提供名称，则为“.NET SqlClient Data Provider”。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Application Name" and "app" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Application Name”和“app”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> and assigns a connection string in the object's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例创建一个新的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 并在对象的构造函数中分配一个连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The code displays the parsed and recreated version of the connection string, and then modifies the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName%2A> property of the object.
trans-unit.target: 该代码显示已分析并重新创建的版本的连接字符串，然后修改对象的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationName%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code displays the new connection string, including the new key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该代码显示包含新键/值对的新连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The sample displays the following text in the console window:
trans-unit.target: 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether asynchronous processing is allowed by the connection created by using this connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定使用此连接字符串创建的连接是否允许异步处理。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.AsynchronousProcessing" /> property, or <see langword="false" /> if no value has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.AsynchronousProcessing" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Asynchronous Processing" and "async" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Asynchronous Processing”和“async”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: In order to take advantage of the asynchronous processing provided by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, this key/value pair must be included within the connection string of the associated <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要利用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> 对象提供的异步处理，此键/值对必须包括在关联的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 对象的连接字符串内。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a connection string and verifies that the connection string is configured to allow for asynchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例检索一个连接字符串，并验证该连接字符串是否配置为允许异步处理。

trans-unit.source: (In this case, the string comes from a procedure within the application, but in a production application, the connection string might come from a configuration file, or some other source.) Then, the example performs an asynchronous operation, updating values within a sample database on a background thread.
trans-unit.target: （在此示例中，该字符串来自于应用程序内的一个过程，但在生产应用程序中，该连接字符串可能来自于配置文件或某些其他源。）然后，此示例执行异步操作，并在后台线程上更新示例数据库中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the primary data file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含主数据文件名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This includes the full path name of an attachable database.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串包括可附加数据库的完整路径名。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="AttachDBFilename" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if no value has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="AttachDBFilename" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "AttachDBFilename", "extended properties", and "initial file name" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“AttachDBFilename”、“extended properties”和“initial file name”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: `AttachDBFilename` is only supported for primary data files with an .mdf extension.
trans-unit.target: `AttachDBFilename` 仅支持具有.mdf 扩展名的主数据文件。

trans-unit.source: An error will be generated if a log file exists in the same directory as the data file and the 'database' keyword is used when attaching the primary data file.
trans-unit.target: 如果日志文件和数据文件存在于同一个目录中，并且在附加主数据文件时使用“database”关键字，则将生成错误。

trans-unit.source: In this case, remove the log file.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，请移除日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Once the database is attached, a new log file will be automatically generated based on the physical path.
trans-unit.target: 附加数据库后，将基于物理路径自动生成一个新日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> instance, and sets the `AttachDBFilename` property in order to specify the name of an attached data file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个新<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>实例，并设置`AttachDBFilename`属性，以便指定附加的数据文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication of the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取连接字符串的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication of the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 实例的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> 方法移除 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 中的所有键/值对，并重置所有对应的属性。

trans-unit.source: This includes setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0, and setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 这包括将 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> 属性设置为 0，并将 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> 属性设置为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This example populates the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> with some key/value pairs, and then calls the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> method and shows the results.
trans-unit.target: 此示例用一些键/值对填充 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>，然后调用 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear%2A> 方法并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the column encryption settings for the connection string builder.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置连接字符串生成器的列加密设置。

trans-unit.source: The column encryption settings for the connection string builder.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串生成器的列加密设置。

trans-unit.source: Obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection is reset when drawn from the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示在从连接池中提取连接时是否重置连接。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionReset" /> property, or true if no value has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionReset" /> 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 true。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Connection Reset" key within the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> connection string, which has been removed from version 3.5 SP1 of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 连接字符串内的“Connection Reset”键相对应，该键已从 .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 版本中移除。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 和更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: The number of reconnections attempted after identifying that there was an idle connection failure.
trans-unit.target: 在确定有一个空闲的连接失败之后尝试重新连接的次数。

trans-unit.source: This must be an integer between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 该值必须是介于 0 和 255 之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: Default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Set to 0 to disable reconnecting on idle connection failures.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 0 将禁止在空闲连接失败时重新连接。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will be thrown if set to a value outside of the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的值超过允许的范围，则将引发 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of reconnections attempted after identifying that there was an idle connection failure.
trans-unit.target: 在确定有一个空闲的连接失败之后尝试重新连接的次数。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 和更高版本中受支持]

trans-unit.source: Amount of time (in seconds) between each reconnection attempt after identifying that there was an idle connection failure.
trans-unit.target: 标识空闲连接失败之后每次重新连接尝试之间的时间量（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This must be an integer between 1 and 60.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须是介于 1 和 60 之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> will be thrown if set to a value outside of the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的值超过允许的范围，则将引发 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time (in seconds) between each reconnection attempt after identifying that there was an idle connection failure.
trans-unit.target: 标识空闲连接失败之后每次重新连接尝试之间的时间量（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在终止尝试并产生错误之前，等待与服务器连接的时间长度（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectTimeout" /> property, or 15 seconds if no value has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectTimeout" /> 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Connect Timeout", "connection timeout", and "timeout" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Connect Timeout”、“connection timeout”和“timeout”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: When opening a connection to a Azure SQL Database, set the connection timeout to 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 打开到 Azure SQL 数据库连接时，设置为 30 秒的连接超时值。

trans-unit.source: The following example first displays the contents of a connection string that does not specify the "Connect Timeout" value, sets the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectTimeout%2A> property, and then displays the new connection string.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例首先显示未指定“Connect Timeout”值的连接字符串的内容，设置 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectTimeout%2A> 属性，然后显示新连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中定位的键。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 是否包含特定键。

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 包含具有指定键的元素，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method determines only if a particular key name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 包含固定大小的键/值对集合，因此 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> 方法只确定特定键名是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> instance, sets some of its properties, and then tries to determine whether various keys exist within the object by calling the **ContainsKey** method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>实例，设置它的一些属性，并尝试以确定是否存在各种键在该对象通过调用**ContainsKey**方法。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the following output in the console window:
trans-unit.target: 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyword" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyword" /> 为 Null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a client/server or in-process connection to SQL Server should be made.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应建立与 SQL Server 的客户端/服务器连接还是进程内连接。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ContextConnection" /> property, or <see langword="False" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ContextConnection" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Context Connection" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Context Connection”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A> property returns `null` if the connection string for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is "context connection=true".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>属性返回`null`如果该连接字符串，为<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>是"上下文连接 = true"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL Server Language record name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL Server 语言记录名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.CurrentLanguage" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if no value has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.CurrentLanguage" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Current Language" and "language" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Current Language”和“language”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要连接到的 SQL Server 实例的名称或网络地址。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Data Source", "server", "address", "addr", and "network address" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Data Source”、“server”、“address”、“addr”和“network address”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of which of these values has been supplied within the supplied connection string, the connection string created by the `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` will use the well-known "Data Source" key.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪个这些值已提供提供的连接字符串内，连接字符串创建的`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`将使用的已知的"数据源"密钥。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates that the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class converts synonyms for the "Data Source" connection string key into the well-known key:
trans-unit.target: 以下示例演示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类将“Data Source”连接字符串键的同义词转换为已知键：

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether SQL Server uses SSL encryption for all data sent between the client and server if the server has a certificate installed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示在服务器安装了证书的情况下，SQL Server 是否为客户端和服务器之间发送的所有数据使用 SSL 加密。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Encrypt" /> property, or <see langword="false" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Encrypt" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Encrypt" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Encrypt”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the SQL Server connection pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 SQL Server 连接池程序是否在创建线程的当前事务上下文中自动登记连接。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist" /> property, or <see langword="true" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Enlist" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Enlist”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name or address of the partner server to connect to if the primary server is down.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在主服务器停机时要连接到的伙伴服务器的名称或地址。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.FailoverPartner" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.FailoverPartner" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the database associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与该连接关联的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.InitialCatalog" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.InitialCatalog" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Initial Catalog" and "database" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Initial Catalog”和“database”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a simple connection string and then uses the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class to add the name of the database to the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例创建一个简单的连接字符串，然后使用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 类将数据库的名称添加到该连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The code displays the contents of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.InitialCatalog%2A> property, just to verify that the class was able to convert from the synonym ("Database") to the appropriate property value.
trans-unit.target: 该代码将显示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.InitialCatalog%2A> 属性的内容，以验证该类能够从同义词 ("Database") 转换为相应的属性值。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether User ID and Password are specified in the connection (when <see langword="false" />) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否在连接中指定用户 ID 和密码（值为 <see langword="false" /> 时），或者是否使用当前的 Windows 帐户凭据进行身份验证（值为 <see langword="true" /> 时）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity" /> property, or <see langword="false" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Integrated Security" and "trusted_connection" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Integrated Security”和“trusted_connection”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an existing connection string from using SQL Server Authentication to using integrated security.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例将现有连接字符串从使用 SQL Server 身份验证转换为使用集成安全性。

trans-unit.source: The example does its work by removing the user name and password from the connection string and then setting the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例通过以下方式来完成此工作：从连接字符串中移除用户名和密码，然后设置 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a password to demonstrate how <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> works with connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个密码以演示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 如何使用连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in every case, because the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> supplies a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 任何情况下都为 <see langword="true" />，因为 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 提供固定大小的键/值对集合。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的项的键。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与指定的键关联的值。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此属性为索引器。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的键相关联的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist within the dictionary throws a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 包含固定大小的字典，因此如果尝试添加的键不在字典中，则会引发 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code, in a console application, creates a new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码在控制台应用程序中新建一个 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>，并使用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> 属性将键/值对添加到其连接字符串中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyword" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyword" /> 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Tried to add a key that does not exist within the available keys.
trans-unit.target: 尝试添加的键不存在于可用键内。

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串中包含无效的值（具体而言，需要使用布尔值或数值，但字符串中并未提供）。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the keys in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 中的键的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the keys in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中的键。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 中的值的顺序未指定，但与 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 属性返回的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> 中的关联值顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: The following console application example creates a new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 以下控制台应用程序示例新建一个 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: The code loops through the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> property displaying the key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 该代码循环访问显示键/值对的 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 属性返回的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum time, in seconds, for the connection to live in the connection pool before being destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接被销毁前在连接池中存活的最短时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout" /> property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout" /> 属性的值，如果未提供任何值，则为 0。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Load Balance Timeout" and "connection lifetime" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Load Balance Timeout”和“connection lifetime”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置针对此特定连接字符串连接池中所允许的最大连接数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize" /> property, or 100 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize" /> 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 100。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Max Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Max Pool Size”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置针对此特定连接字符串连接池中所允许的最小连接数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize" /> property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize" /> 属性的值，如果未提供任何值，则为 0。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Min Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Min Pool Size”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: When true, an application can maintain multiple active result sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true，则应用程序可以维护多个活动结果集 (MARS)。

trans-unit.source: When false, an application must process or cancel all result sets from one batch before it can execute any other batch on that connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 false，则应用程序必须先处理或取消某一批中的所有结果集，才可以在该连接上执行任何其他批次。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS)](http://msdn.microsoft.com//library/cfa084cz.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[多个活动结果集 (MARS)](http://msdn.microsoft.com//library/cfa084cz.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MultipleActiveResultSets" /> property, or <see langword="false" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.MultipleActiveResultSets" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "MultipleActiveResultSets" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“MultipleActiveResultSets”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The following example explicitly disables the Multiple Active Result Sets feature.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显式禁用多个活动结果集功能。

trans-unit.source: If your application is connecting to an AlwaysOn availability group (AG) on different subnets, setting MultiSubnetFailover=true provides faster detection of and connection to the (currently) active server.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序要连接到不同子网上的 AlwaysOn 可用性组 (AG)，则设置 MultiSubnetFailover=true 会加快检测（当前）活动服务器以及与服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: For more information about SqlClient support for Always On Availability Groups, see [SqlClient Support for High Availability, Disaster Recovery](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关对 Always On 可用性组的 SqlClient 支持的详细信息，请参阅[对高可用性、灾难恢复的 SqlClient 支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> indicating the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，这指示属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the network library used to establish a connection to the SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含用于建立与 SQL Server 的连接的网络库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.NetworkLibrary" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.NetworkLibrary" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Network Library", "network", and "net" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Network Library”、“network”和“net”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Supported values for this property include dbnmpntw (Named Pipes), dbmsrpcn (Multiprotocol), dbmsadsn (AppleTalk), dbmsgnet (VIA), dbmslpcn (Shared Memory) and dbmsspxn (IPX/SPX), and dbmssocn (TCP/IP).
trans-unit.target: 此属性支持的值包括 dbnmpntw（命名管道）、dbmsrpcn（多协议）、dbmsadsn (AppleTalk)、dbmsgnet (VIA)、dbmslpcn（共享内存）、dbmsspxn (IPX/SPX) 和 dbmssocn (TCP/IP)。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding network DLL must be installed on the system to which you connect.
trans-unit.target: 必须在系统上安装您要连接到的相应网络 DLL。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a network and you use a local server (for example, "." or "(local)"), Shared Memory is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定网络且使用本地服务器（例如“.”或“(local)”），则将使用共享内存。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size in bytes of the network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来与 SQL Server 的实例通信的网络数据包的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.PacketSize" /> property, or 8000 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.PacketSize" /> 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 8000。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Packet Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Packet Size”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the SQL Server account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL Server 帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Password" and "pwd" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Password”和“pwd”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A> has not been set and you retrieve the value, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>尚未设置和检索值，则返回值为<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: To reset the password for the connection string, pass null to the Item property.
trans-unit.target: 要重置连接字符串的密码，向传递 null 项属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The password was incorrectly set to null.
trans-unit.target: 密码错误地设置为 null。

trans-unit.source: See code sample below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅下面的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示如果连接是打开的或者一直处于打开状态，那么安全敏感信息（如密码）是否将不作为连接的一部分返回。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo" /> property, or <see langword="false" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" and "persistsecurityinfo" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Persist Security Info”和“persistsecurityinfo”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The blocking period behavior for a connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 连接池的暂停时段行为。

trans-unit.source: The available blocking period settings.
trans-unit.target: 可用的暂停时段设置。

trans-unit.source: When connection pooling is enabled and a timeout error or other login error occurs, an exception will be thrown and subsequent connection attempts will fail for the next five seconds, the "blocking period".
trans-unit.target: 当启用连接池发生超时错误或其他登录错误，将引发异常并且后续连接尝试将失败接下来的五秒内，"阻塞期"。

trans-unit.source: If the application attempts to connect within the blocking period, the first exception will be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序尝试在阻塞期内进行连接，则将再次引发第一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent failures after a blocking period ends will result in a new blocking period that is twice as long as the previous blocking period, up to a maximum of one minute.
trans-unit.target: 阻塞期结束后的后续失败将导致新的阻塞期，则两次长达前一阻塞期，最大为一分钟。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to connect to Azure SQL databases can fail with transient errors which are typically recovered within a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: 尝试连接到 Azure SQL 数据库可能因暂时性错误，它通常在几秒内恢复。

trans-unit.source: However, with the connection pool blocking period behavior, you may not be able to reach your database for extensive periods even though the database is available.
trans-unit.target: 但是，与连接池阻止时间段的行为，你可能不能用于广泛段访问您的数据库，即使数据库可用。

trans-unit.source: This is especially problematic for apps that need to render fast.
trans-unit.target: 这是需要快速呈现应用程序尤其存在问题。

trans-unit.source: The **PoolBlockingPeriod** enables you to select the blocking period best suited for your app.
trans-unit.target: **PoolBlockingPeriod**使您能够选择最适合你的应用程序阻塞期。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.PoolBlockingPeriod> enumeration for available settings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.PoolBlockingPeriod>可用设置的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection will be pooled or explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示每次请求连接时该连接是汇入连接池还是显式打开。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling" /> property, or <see langword="true" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Pooling" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Pooling”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中的连接字符串移除的键/值对中的键。

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 实例中移除具有指定的键的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key existed within the connection string and was removed; <see langword="false" /> if the key did not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果该键存在于连接字符串中并已被移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该键不存在，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the **Remove** method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: 因为**删除**方法返回一个值，指示其是否成功，它不需要查找键在尝试删除的键/值对从之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>实例。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove%2A> method simply resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 保持固定大小的键/值对集合，因此调用 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Remove%2A> 方法只会将键/值对的值重置回其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Because the collection of keys supported by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 所支持的键集合是固定的，因此该集合中的每一项都具有已知的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例将现有连接字符串从使用 Windows 身份验证转换为使用集成安全性。

trans-unit.source: The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例通过以下方式来完成此工作：从连接字符串中移除用户名和密码，然后设置 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A> 对象的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example includes a password to demonstrate how <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> works with connection strings.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括一个密码以演示 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 如何使用连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the following text in the console window:
trans-unit.target: 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyword" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyword" /> 为 Null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether replication is supported using the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否使用连接来支持复制。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Replication" /> property, or false if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Replication" /> 属性的值；如果未提供任何值，则为 false。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Replication" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Replication”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中定位的键。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key exists in this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 实例中是否存在指定的键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> contains an entry with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 包含具有指定键的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method behaves identically to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的行为与 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> 方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that indicates how the connection maintains its association with an enlisted <see langword="System.Transactions" /> transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指示该连接如何保持与登记 <see langword="System.Transactions" /> 事务的关联。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TransactionBinding" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TransactionBinding" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The Transaction Binding keywords in a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> control how a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> binds to an enlisted <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> 中的 Transaction Binding 关键字控制 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 如何绑定到登记的 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible values for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TransactionBinding%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TransactionBinding%2A> 属性的可能值：

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Implicit Unbind
trans-unit.target: Implicit Unbind

trans-unit.source: The default.
trans-unit.target: 默认值。

trans-unit.source: Causes the connection to detach from the transaction when it ends.
trans-unit.target: 事务结束时，使连接与事务分离。

trans-unit.source: After detaching, additional requests on the connection are performed in autocommit mode.
trans-unit.target: 分离后，在自动模式下对连接执行其他请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> property is not checked when executing requests while the transaction is active.
trans-unit.target: 在事务处于活动状态的情况下，执行请求时不会检查 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: After the transaction has ended, additional requests are performed in autocommit mode.
trans-unit.target: 事务结束后，会在自动模式下执行其他请求。

trans-unit.source: Explicit Unbind
trans-unit.target: Explicit Unbind

trans-unit.source: Causes the connection to remain attached to the transaction until the connection is closed or until <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A> is called with a `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) value.
trans-unit.target: 原因连接保持附加到事务直到连接已关闭，或者直到<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A>使用调用`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> is not the enlisted transaction or if the enlisted transaction is not active.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 不是登记事务或者登记事务未处于活动状态，则将引发 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enforces the strict scoping rules required for <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> support.
trans-unit.target: 此行为强制实施 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> 支持所需的严格范围限定规则。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this key is set to <see langword="true" />, the application is required to retrieve all IP addresses for a particular DNS entry and attempt to connect with the first one in the list.
trans-unit.target: 将该键的值设置为 <see langword="true" /> 时，需要应用程序检索特定 DNS 条目的所有 IP 地址并尝试连接到列表中的第一个地址。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is not established within 0.5 seconds, the application will try to connect to all others in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 如果未在 0.5 秒内建立连接，应用程序将尝试并行连接到所有其他地址。

trans-unit.source: When the first answers, the application will establish the connection with the respondent IP address.
trans-unit.target: 第一个地址响应后，应用程序将与响应的 IP 地址建立连接。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值。

trans-unit.source: If the `MultiSubnetFailover` key is set to `true`, `TransparentNetworkIPResolution` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`MultiSubnetFailover`键设置为`true`，`TransparentNetworkIPResolution`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the `Failover Partner` key is set, `TransparentNetworkIPResolution` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Failover Partner`设置注册表项，`TransparentNetworkIPResolution`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The value of this key must be `true`, `false`, `yes`, or `no`.
trans-unit.target: 此键的值必须是`true`， `false`， `yes`，或`no`。

trans-unit.source: A value of `yes` is treated the same as a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 值为`yes`是视为相同的值`true`。

trans-unit.source: A value of `no` is treated the same as a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 值为`no`是视为相同的值`false`。

trans-unit.source: This key defaults to `false` when:
trans-unit.target: 此参数默认为`false`时：

trans-unit.source: Connecting to Azure SQL Database where the data source ends with:
trans-unit.target: 连接到 Azure SQL 数据库数据源的结尾：

trans-unit.source: .database.chinacloudapi.cn
trans-unit.target: .database.chinacloudapi.cn

trans-unit.source: .database.usgovcloudapi.net
trans-unit.target: .database.usgovcloudapi.net

trans-unit.source: .database.cloudapi.de
trans-unit.target: .database.cloudapi.de

trans-unit.source: .database.windows.net
trans-unit.target: .database.windows.net

trans-unit.source: `Authentication` is 'Active Directory Password' or 'Active Directory Integrated'
trans-unit.target: `Authentication` Active Directory 密码或 Active Directory 集成

trans-unit.source: Otherwise it defaults to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它默认为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the channel will be encrypted while bypassing walking the certificate chain to validate trust.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在跳过用于验证信任的证书链遍历时是否加密信道。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Recognized values are <see langword="true" />, <see langword="false" />, <see langword="yes" />, and <see langword="no" />.
trans-unit.target: 已识别的值为 <see langword="true" />、<see langword="false" />、<see langword="yes" /> 和 <see langword="no" />。

trans-unit.source: When `TrustServerCertificate` is set to `true`, the transport layer will use SSL to encrypt the channel and bypass walking the certificate chain to validate trust.
trans-unit.target: 当 `TrustServerCertificate` 设置为 `true` 时，传输层将使用 SSL 来加密通道并跳过证书链以验证信任。

trans-unit.source: If `TrustServerCertificate` is set to `true` and encryption is turned on, the encryption level specified on the server will be used even if `Encrypt` is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`TrustServerCertificate`设置为`true`和打开加密时，将使用服务器上指定的加密级别即使`Encrypt`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The connection will fail otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 否则连接将会失败。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Encryption Hierarchy" and "Using Encryption Without Validation" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"加密层次结构"和"使用未经验证的加密"SQL Server 联机丛书中。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的项的键。

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to <c>keyword.</c>
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>keyword</c> 相对应的值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 从此 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中检索与提供的键相对应的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyword" /> was found within the connection string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在连接字符串中找到 <paramref name="keyword" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue%2A> method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue%2A> 方法允许开发人员安全地从 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 中检索值，而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。

trans-unit.source: Because **TryGetValue** does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: 因为**TryGetValue**不会引发异常时调用它，传递中不存在的键，则不需要查找键检索其值之前。

trans-unit.source: Calling **TryGetValue** with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用**TryGetValue**与不存在的键将值为 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the behavior of the **TryGetValue** method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的行为**TryGetValue**方法。

trans-unit.source: The sample displays the following results:
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示以下结果：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyword" /> contains a null value (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyword" /> 包含一个 null 值（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that indicates the type system the application expects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值指示应用程序所需的类型系统。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible values for the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TypeSystemVersion" /> property:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.TypeSystemVersion" /> 属性的可能值：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 2005
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 2005

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Uses the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 2005 type system.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 使用[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]2005年类型系统。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are made for the current version of ADO.NET.
trans-unit.target: 未对当前版本的 ADO.NET 执行转换。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> SQL Server 2008
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> SQL Server 2008

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Uses the SQL Server 2008 type system.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 使用 SQL Server 2008 类型系统。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Latest
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 最新

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Use the latest version than this client-server pair can handle.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 不是此客户端-服务器对能够处理，请使用最新版本。

trans-unit.source: This will automatically move forward as the client and server components are upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 这个最新版本将随着客户端和服务器组件的升级自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The `TypeSystemVersion` property can be used to specify a down-level version of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] for applications written against that version.
trans-unit.target: `TypeSystemVersion`属性可以用于指定的下级版本[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]编写针对该版本的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This avoids possible problems with incompatible types in a newer version of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] that may cause the application to break.
trans-unit.target: 这样就避免了不兼容的类型中的较新版本的可能问题[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]，可能会导致应用程序中断。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user ID to be used when connecting to SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接到 SQL Server 时要使用的用户 ID。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.UserID" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.UserID" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "User ID", "user", and "uid" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“User ID”、“user”和“uid”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to redirect the connection from the default SQL Server Express instance to a runtime-initiated instance running under the account of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将连接从默认的 SQL Server Express 实例重定向到在调用方帐户之下运行并且在运行时启动的实例。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.UserInstance" /> property, or <see langword="False" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.UserInstance" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "User Instance" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“User Instance”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only with the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Express Edition.
trans-unit.target: 此功能是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]Express Edition。

trans-unit.source: For more information on user instances, see [SQL Server Express User Instances](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-express-user-instances.md) and "User Instances for Non-Administrators" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 用户实例的详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server Express 用户实例](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sql-server-express-user-instances.md)和"用户实例的非管理员"中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the values in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 中的值的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the values in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder" /> 中的值。

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 中的值的顺序未指定，但与 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 属性返回的 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> 中的关联键顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Because each instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> always contains the same fixed set of keys, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys.
trans-unit.target: 因为每个 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> 实例始终包含相同的固定键集合，所以 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> 属性始终返回与固定键集合相对应的值，顺序与键相同。

trans-unit.source: The following example first creates a new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, and then iterates through all the values within the object.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例首先新建一个 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>，然后循环访问该对象内的所有值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the workstation connecting to SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接到 SQL Server 的工作站的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.WorkstationID" /> property, or <see langword="String.Empty" /> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.WorkstationID" /> 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Workstation ID" and "wsid" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与连接字符串内的“Workstation ID”和“wsid”键相对应。

trans-unit.source: To set the value to null, use <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将值设置为 null，请使用 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />。
